text: The Karelo-Finnish Soviet Socialist Republic was the shortest lived part of the Soviet Union. It included part of Finland and all of Karelia. The territory was only part of the USSR for 16 years from 1940 to 1956. ==Related pages== * Anthem of the Karelo-Finnish Soviet Socialist Republic Category:1940 establishments in Europe Category:1956 disestablishments in Europe Category:Republics of the Soviet Union Category:Karelia
title: Karelo-Finnish Soviet Socialist Republic
